rev.comment: Van Halen was not a forerunner of glam and the link takes you to this page!
[[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/74.33.219.82|74.33.219.82]] ([[User talk:74.33.219.82|talk]]) to last version by Mgern26

Added (album) to Van Halen "Certified diamond" so people wouldn't be confused into thinking that was their total sales. Also took out reference to them being forerunners of "glam Metal." They weren't!
